Articles.Content: If I have a duna transfer window, get to dunan orbit, and want to go back to kerbin, do I need to wait for another transfer window?

You do indeed, but you need to wait for the window FROM Duna TO Kerbin and not the other way round. Transfer windows from Duna to Kerbin will probably be just before your ship gets to Duna so expect a long wait to get back again. If you have fuel, visit Ike for some extra science and achievements.
